CScopedContainer< STL_CONTAINER > Class Template Reference

Similar to CScopedPtr, except that a STL container of pointers is expected which has to be freed with DeleteContents. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename STL_CONTAINER>
class CScopedContainer< STL_CONTAINER >

Similar to CScopedPtr, except that a STL container of pointers is expected which has to be freed with DeleteContents.

See also:
CScopedPtr

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CScopedContainer< STL_CONTAINER >::CScopedContainer ( STL_CONTAINER *  ptr  )  [inline]

Constructor.

Note that CScopedContainer takes ownership of the array.
